pr_title: Add integration test for resolving `ballerina` modules from central

timeline.message: Add integration test for resolving `ballerina` modules from central
Add integration test for resolving `ballerina` modules from central

timeline.bodyText: If I'm not mistaken, this test will be failing once a newer version of the socket module is available, as the module version is hard-coded here. Is it the expected behaviour or am I missing something?
timeline.author: NipunaRanasinghe

replies.bodyText: This particular module version is pushed to staging central server we used a high version number so that newer version will not break the test.  I doubt socket module will reach 9.0.0. The test will check if newer modules in central will get pulled even though module is found in bit cache.
replies.author: hevayo

replies.bodyText: The current ballerina/socket version is 0.6.5, So we decided to pull a higher version (9.0.0) than that to stg-central. In this test case that pulled version to stg-central is pulling when building this project. Normally we are using stg-central only for testing purposes and newer versions will to add to it. So we will not have a need to update this version in the near future. Do we have any good way of doing this? So I can put another PR for that.
replies.author: pramodya1994

replies.bodyText: @hevayo @pramodya1994 thanks for the explanations. I also think this would be okay as we are using an unreachable version. +1
replies.author: NipunaRanasinghe
